content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I get your name to start scheduling your electrical service?
It's Frank. I need something fixed with one of the outlets in the kitchen.
Thank you, Frank! Could you please provide your address so I can make sure we serve your area?
Great, thank you! When would you like us to come by to check the kitchen outlet? Please let me know your preferred date and time.
Actually, before I go any further, I have to check with my wife first. She likes to be involved in decisions like this.
Of course, Frank! Please feel free to reach out once you've had a chance to discuss with your wife. If you have any questions or need to book, I'm here to help anytime!
reason: Customer needs spouse's approval before scheduling.
